snippet.title: PLAY AS THE SLENDERMAN - New Multiplayer Horror Game
snippet.description:
Play as The #Slenderman and stalk your friends around! 🕴🏻

Teleport to hunt all survivors down and become the winner of this new #multiplayer #horror #game! 🏆 

👉🏻 Get it on #Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2097440/Horror_Night_The_Slenderman_takings/

#multiplayergames  #SurvivalHorror #pcgames  #steamgames  #gamingcommunity  #horrorgaming  #gamer  #newgames 

About DeadlyCrow Games
Indie Videogame Studio based in Santiago, Chile. Creators of Escape The Ayuwoki and Horror Night sagas. 

Official Websites:
https://www.deadlycrowgames.com/
https://store.steampowered.com/franchise/deadlycrowgames
https://deadlycrowgames.itch.io/
